titleStmt.title: SII 7.493: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 493. (A.R. No. 274-B of 1901). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
śubhamastu cu svasti . ciṟimaṉmakāmāṇṭalicuraṉ Irācātarāca paramecuraṉ śrīAccutatevamakāIrāyar piṟitiviIrācciyam paṇṇiAruḷāniṉṟa cakāṟtaM 1000 4 100 6 10 2 melcellāniṉṟa vikāricaṅkaṟcarattu makaranāyaṟṟu pūṟuvapakṣattu cattamiyum cukkiravāramum peṟṟa Acuvati nakṣattiratti nāḷ śrīmaṉ
makāmaṇṭalicura kāverivallapa ka kkāṟa vekucaṉa Irācākkaḷai kottu Eṭukkum kaṇṭaṉ virutuUḷḷavarkaḷai vāyaṭakkum pettaiyatevamakaārācāviṉ kumarar Aṅkaraācāviṉ teviyār calakkaraācāviṉ kumārattiyār kantāṭaiAṇṇaṉ cipāta Uḷḷa AkkācciAmma taṉṉāĀka perumāḷ tiruppernakarān tiruviḷaiyāṭṭam muṉṉāḷ śrīkāriyanimittam Āka velinilam OṟṟiĀka Irukkaiyil Anta nilam AkkācciAmmaṉ taṉmamāka
tammuṭaiya kaiyil poṉṉāka muppatu poṉ kuṭut=tu An=ta veli nilam miḷukaiyil Anta veli nilattil kuttakaippaṭi nellu Irunūṟṟukkalam Inta nellu nālupaṭikkālāl nellu Irunūṟṟukkalat=tukkum kuṟṟal vācaṟkuṟuvār kūli nikki kaṇṭa Ammutupaṭi Eṇpatiṉ kalamum AkkācciAmmaṉ taṉmamāka perumāḷ tiruppernakarāṉtaḷikaikkun nāḷ Oṉṟukku Amutupaṭi patakku nāṉāḻiyum perumāḷ Ammutuceytu Aruḷi
Anta piṟacātam perumāḷ tiruppernakarāṉ tiruppatiyil AkkācciAmmaṉ Irāmāñciya kūṭattil nāḷ Oṉṟukku pattu śrīvayiṭṭaṇavarkaḷukku AkkācciAmmaṉ taṉmamāka Iṭṭapaṭiyāle Inta taṉmam cantiṟātittavaraiyum naṭattukaṭavarākavum Irāmāṉuciyakūṭat=tukku tirupper tiṟivaṉṉa śrīvayiṭṭaṇavār vatkaṭṭa timmaiyar Iraṅkayarmukāntiramāka śrīvayiṭṭaṇavarkaḷai AmmutucetuAruḷapaṇṇikkoṇṭu varattakkatāka AkkācciAmmaṉ kaṭṭaḷaippaṭi
yāle Inta Irāmāñciyakūṭam Avare vicārippavarkaḷākavum koyilkaṇakku tirupperuṭaiyāṉ cuntiraperumāḷ tittāṉ Eḻuttu
Digital edition of SII 7.493 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
